reviews.name: Th·∫£o Vi D∆∞
reviews.review: Staff's attitude is extremely good. I ordered a portion of spicy chicken, but when I tried it, it wasn't spicy. I complained to the staff member and he said, "Our chicken doesn't have any sauce but it's still spicy." But I tried it and it's really not spicy, I told the staff. She rolled her eyes at me again and then scolded me, "Have you tried it yet?". At that time, I had just come home from school and was extremely hungry, but I couldn't eat well and still felt miserable.
